title: Main Features of B593s-931
answer:
The B593s-931 mainly supports the following features: 

 l Access to LTE/DC-HSPA+/HSPA+/HSPA/UMTS/EDGE/GPRS/GSM wireless networks 

 l Access to wired Ethernet networks 

 l On the Ethernet, LTE FDD downlink packet data service at a maximum transmission rate of 100 Mbit/s (theoretical value) 

 l On a Wi-Fi network, LTE FDD downlink packet data service at a maximum transmission rate of 150 Mbit/s (theoretical value) 

 l LTE FDD uplink packet data service at a maximum transmission rate of 50 Mbit/s (theoretical value) 

 l On the Ethernet, LTE TDD downlink packet data service at a maximum transmission rate of 100 Mbit/s (theoretical value) 

 l On a Wi-Fi network, LTE TDD downlink packet data service at a maximum transmission rate of 110 Mbit/s (theoretical value) 

 l LTE TDD uplink packet data service at a maximum transmission rate of 10 Mbit/s (theoretical value) 

 l DC-HSPA+ downlink packet data service at a maximum transmission rate of 43.2 Mbit/s (theoretical value) 

 l HSPA+ downlink packet data service at a maximum transmission rate of 21.6 Mbit/s (theoretical value) 

 l HSPA downlink packet data service at a maximum transmission rate of 14.4 Mbit/s (theoretical value) 

 l HSPA uplink packet data service at a maximum transmission rate of 5.76 Mbit/s (theoretical value) 

 l UMTS packet data service at a maximum transmission rate of 384 kbit/s (theoretical value) 

 l UMTS circuit-switched data service at a maximum transmission rate of 64 kbit/s (theoretical value) 

 l EDGE packet data service at a maximum transmission rate of 236.8 kbit/s (theoretical value) 

 l GPRS packet data service at a maximum transmission rate of 85.6 kbit/s (theoretical value) 

 l IEEE802.11b/g/n 

 l Functioning as a Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP) server and supporting Network Address Translation (NAT) 

 l Security functions 

 l Internet Protocol version 6 (IPv6)/Internet Protocol version 4 (IPv4) dual stack 

 l Wi-Fi and Wi-Fi protected setup (WPS) 

 l Remote management capability with TR069 (available in later versions) 

 l Windows XP SP3, Windows Vista SP1/SP2, Windows 7, Windows 8, Mac OS X 10.6, 10.7, and 10.8 with latest upgrades 

 l LTE external antenna port 

 l USB 2.0 host port 

 l Personalized light emitting diode (LED) indicators
